snippet.title: Tournament: Blood & Steel gameplay preview (v0.6)
snippet.description:
Get Tournament: Blood & Steel on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1040620/Tournament_Blood__Steel/?beta=0

About the Game:
Tournament : Blood & Steel is a single player medieval action game with role playing elements. The game is set in the fictional land of Edron in which the player must fight in gladiatorial tournaments to earn fame and riches!

This is a gameplay preview of the new Tournament gamemode which is out now in version 0.6, stay tuned for the trailer and more game development updates!
